Plot: "Brilla Por Ti" (26×44') is a social awareness project that aims to support the underprivileged people of the world. This program aims to go across Latin America and the world, to offer a helping hand to those who need it the most.
Title: Brilla por ti
Actors: Géraldine Bazán, Ana Alejandra Carrizo, Dovi Eisenman, Erika Ender
